title: The Magic flute [Animated]
brief_description: Based on Mozart’s much loved opera, “The Magic Flute” tells the story of Prince Tamino who promises the Queen of the Night he will rescue her kidnapped daughter Pamina from the evil clutches of King Sarastro. The Queen gives him a magic flute and her birdman Papageno to help him on his journey. On this dangerous journey Prince Tamino discovers not only that he has been deceived, but true love as well. Features the voices of Mark Hamill, Samantha Eggar and Michael York.
